meta.title: 2026 Year of the Horse - Gudupao Spark Official New Year Page
meta.description: Gudupao Spark 2026 Year of the Horse Chinese New Year Official Celebration Page. Prosperity and success.

hero.subtitle: Gudupao Spark wishes you in the 2026 Year of the Horse:
hero.subtitle_suffix: , everything goes smoothly, creativity flows, and dreams come true.

features.description: Wishing you health, prosperity, family happiness, and great success in the new year!

happy_new_year.title: Happy New Year
happy_new_year.desc: Wishing you a happy new year and all your wishes come true!

health.title: Health
health.desc: Wishing you good health, high spirits, and vitality!

family.title: Family Happiness
family.desc: Wishing your family harmony, happiness, and togetherness!

wealth.title: Prosperity
wealth.desc: Wishing you prosperity, smooth career, and continuous promotion!

study.title: Academic Success
study.desc: Wishing you success in your studies and a bright future!

work.title: Smooth Work
work.desc: Wishing you smooth work, career success, and great achievements!

showcase.description: Reviewing the wonderful moments of the past year and looking forward to the infinite possibilities of the future.

open_source.title: Open Source Projects
open_source.desc: We have created many useful open source projects this year.

about.description: Gudupao Spark was founded on January 31, 2023. We want to create a warm working atmosphere where everyone can bravely pursue their dreams!
